title: Aegypti Delta et Nili Ostia
creator: Cellarius, Christoph 1638-1707
extent: 1 map : hand color ; 20 x 30 cm. on sheet (25 x 31)
description: Shows boundaries, roads, rivers, towns and principal settlements. Also shows a part of the Arabian Peninsula. Publication date from the library's acquisition form.
subject: Geography, Ancient; Nile River Delta (Egypt) -- Historical geography -- Early works to 1800 -- Maps; Egypt -- Historical geography -- Early works to 1800 -- Maps; Arabian Peninsula -- Early works to 1800 -- Maps; Early maps
